title: Watch out
body: So there is this scammer going around his main account name is _Name Removed_ and he has 4 other accounts if you see anyone in oce trying to get a vayne skin and threating to scam other or  pay you back report him

replies.body:
Hey Complex Link,

We appreciate the good intentions here, but Naming and Shaming is not allowed. It's also not very effective to report people on the boards because chances are, not that many people (including Rioters) will see it.

The best thing you can do is send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) directly to Riot about this guy. The best category to use is _I want to report abusive behavior, cheating, or a malicious link_.
